00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         MMuSCAnalysisC.cpp
00004   Created by:   Tom Banks
00005 
00006   Contents:     Generates muSC histograms, and extracts important
00007                 offset information from the ODB.
00008 
00009 \********************************************************************/
00010                                                         
00011 /*-- Include files -------------------------------------------------*/

00014 #include <stdio.h>
00015 #include <stdlib.h>

00017 /* MIDAS includes */
00018 #include "midas.h"
00019 
00020 /* ROOT includes */
00021 #include "TH1.h"
00022 #include "TDirectory.h"
00023 
00024 /* MuCap includes */
00025 #include "common.h"
00026 #include "ucb_common.h"
00027 #include "uiuc_utils.h"

00029 extern HNDLE hDB;
00030 extern TDirectory *gManaHistsDir;
00031 
00032 /*-- Parameters ----------------------------------------------------*/
00033 
00034 double muSCCopy2TimeOffset;
00035 double muSCATimeOffset;
00036 double muSCRoutedTimeOffset[4];
00037 
00038 /*-- Static parameters ---------------------------------------------*/
00039 
00040 // Declare histograms
00041 static TH1 *muSC_time;
00042 static TH1 *muSC_copy1_successive_hit_tdiffs;
00043 static TH1 *muSC_copy1_AD_successive_hit_tdiffs;
00044 static TH1 *muSC_router_seq_errors;
00045 static TH1 *muSC_error_blocks_skipped;

00065 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00066 
00067 INT MMuSCAnalysisC_init(void)
00068 {
00069   /* Read time offsets for the various copies of the muSC from the ODB */
00070   char key_name[80];
00071   int size,runnumber;
00072   sprintf(key_name, "Runinfo/Run number");
00073   size=sizeof(int);
00074   db_get_value(hDB,0,key_name, &runnumber, &size, TID_INT,1);
00075   // printf("==================\n\n\n in MMuSCAnalysisC_init\n runnumber is %d\n\n=============\n",runnumber);
00076   int PSI_runnumber=1;
00077   char stem[200];
00078   sprintf(stem,"/Experiment/Run%d",PSI_runnumber);
00079   printf("==================\n\n\n in MMuSCAnalysisC_init\n PSI runnumber is %d\n\n=============\n",PSI_runnumber); 
00080   sprintf(key_name, "%s/muSC/muSCCopy2TimeOffset",stem);
00081   size = sizeof(muSCCopy2TimeOffset);
00082   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key_name, &muSCCopy2TimeOffset, &size, TID_DOUBLE, 1);
00083 
00084   sprintf(key_name, "%s/muSC/muSCATimeOffset",stem);
00085   size = sizeof(muSCATimeOffset);
00086   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key_name, &muSCATimeOffset, &size, TID_DOUBLE, 1);
00087 
00088   sprintf(key_name, "%s/muSC/muSCRoutedTimeOffset",stem);
00089   size = sizeof(muSCRoutedTimeOffset);
00090   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key_name, &muSCRoutedTimeOffset, &size, TID_DOUBLE, 1);
00091 
00092   /****** Construct histograms ******/
00093   char hist_name[256];
00094   char hist_title[256];
00095 
00096   // muSC successive hits tdiff histogram
00097   sprintf(hist_name,  "muSC_copy1_successive_hit_tdiffs");
00098   sprintf(hist_title, "#muSC tdiffs between successive hits");
00099   muSC_copy1_successive_hit_tdiffs = new TH1D(hist_name, hist_title, 44201, -5000.625, 50250.625);
00100 
00101   // muSC time histogram                                                                                          
00102     sprintf(hist_name,  "muSC_time");
00103   sprintf(hist_title, "muSC time");
00104   muSC_time = new TH1D(hist_name, hist_title, 44201, -5000.625, 50250.625);
00105   
00106   // muSC successive hits tdiff histogram, after artificial deadtime (AD)
00107   sprintf(hist_name,  "muSC_copy1_AD_successive_hit_tdiffs");
00108   sprintf(hist_title, "#muSC tdiffs between successive AD hits");
00109   muSC_copy1_AD_successive_hit_tdiffs = new TH1D(hist_name, hist_title, 44201, -5000.625, 50250.625);
00110 
00111   // muSC router sequence error tracking
00112   sprintf(hist_name,  "muSC_router_seq_errors");
00113   sprintf(hist_title, "#muSC router sequence errors");
00114   muSC_router_seq_errors = new TH1D(hist_name, hist_title, 4, -0.5, 3.5);
00115 
00116   // Blocks skipped due to muSC copy1/copy2 count discrepancies
00117   sprintf(hist_name,  "blocks_skipped_muSC_matching_errors");
00118   sprintf(hist_title, "blocks skipped due to #muSC matching errors");
00119   muSC_error_blocks_skipped = new TH1D(hist_name, hist_title, 3, -0.5, 2.5);
00120 
00121  return SUCCESS;
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00125 
00126 INT MMuSCAnalysisC(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00127 {
00128   /* ############################################### */
00129   // Open up the "HITS" bank
00130   channel_hit *hit_bank;
00131   int hit_bank_size = bk_locate(pevent, "HITS", (DWORD *) &hit_bank);
00132   hit_bank_size = hit_bank_size * sizeof(DWORD) / sizeof(channel_hit);
00133   if (hit_bank == NULL) {
00134     fprintf(stderr, "MMuSCAnalysisC: Could not find bank HITS.\n");
00135   }
00136 
00137   /* ############################################### */
00138   // MuSC arrival histograms, with and w/o AD.
00139   int prevMuSChitindex = -1;
00140   int prevMuSCADhitindex = -1;
00141   for (int i=0; i<hit_bank_size; i++) {
00142     if (hit_bank[i].parameter == 6001) {
00143       muSC_time->Fill(hit_bank[i].time);
00144       // Successive tdiffs between muSC copy1 (parameter 6001) hits
00145       if (prevMuSChitindex >= 0) {
00146         double tdiff = hit_bank[i].time - 
00147                        hit_bank[prevMuSChitindex].time;
00148         muSC_copy1_successive_hit_tdiffs->Fill(tdiff);
00149       }
00150       prevMuSChitindex = i;
00151 
00152       // Successive tdiffs between AD muSC hits
00153       if (prevMuSCADhitindex >= 0) {
00154         double tdiff = hit_bank[i].time - 
00155                        hit_bank[prevMuSCADhitindex].time;
00156         if (tdiff > kMuSCADInterval) {
00157           muSC_copy1_AD_successive_hit_tdiffs->Fill(tdiff);
00158           prevMuSCADhitindex = i;
00159         }
00160       }
00161       if (prevMuSCADhitindex == -1) {
00162         prevMuSCADhitindex = i;
00163       }
00164 
00165     }
00166   }
00167 
00168   /* ############################################### */
00169 
00170   // check that the routed muSC always alternates 1-2-3-4
00171   int last_route_port = -1;
00172   double last_route_time = -1;
00173   for (int i=0; i<hit_bank_size; i++) {
00174     if (hit_bank[i].parameter >= 6006 && hit_bank[i].parameter <= 6009) {
00175       int port = hit_bank[i].parameter - 6006;
00176       if(last_route_port != -1 && port != (last_route_port+1)%4) {
00177         muSC_router_seq_errors->Fill(port);
00178       }
00179       last_route_port = port;
00180       last_route_time = hit_bank[i].time;
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00184   /* ############################################### */
00185 
00186   // look for too many mismatched muSC copy 1 vs. copy 2 hits
00187   bool skip = false;
00188   for(int i = 1; i <= 2; i++) { 
00189     char name[80];
00190     sprintf(name, "muSC_copy%d_only_block", i);
00191     TH1 *only = (TH1 *) gManaHistsDir->Get(name);
00192     if(only == NULL) {
00193       fprintf(stderr, "Warning: Unable to find histogram %s\n", name);
00194       continue;
00195     }
00196     int bin = only->GetXaxis()->FindBin(pheader->serial_number);
00197     if(only->GetBinContent(bin) > kMuSCMismatchThreshold+0.5) {
00198       fprintf(stderr, "Skipping block %d: too many hits in muSC copy %d only (%f)\n", 
00199               pheader->serial_number, i, only->GetBinContent(bin));
00200       skip = true;
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   if(skip) {
00205     muSC_error_blocks_skipped->Fill(1);     
00206     return ANA_SKIP;
00207   } else {
00208     return SUCCESS;
00209   }
00210 }
